rows.label: tlk4170042103_msg0001
rows.name:
The swelling mountains of clouds...
For whose sake were they made so high?

rows.label: tlk4170042103_msg0002
rows.name:
I wish to express the ridges of the Cloud Sea,
but it is quite difficult...

rows.label: tlk4170042103_msg0003
rows.name:
It is a great joy to seek new expressions...
Thank you for inviting me.
